channel.title: 'Error: Click for details.' Problem
channel.description:
I really need some help for this. I think my server won't run for this reason, too.
This is really making me mad. For about a month or so, I can't get on RuneScape, Silab Client, MoparScape, or even my SYIpkpker because of this error. If anyone tells me this problem, many thanks to you.
This error isn't just for RuneScape, it's for alot of things too.
Here's a picture for proof that I have the error:
[IMG]http://img523.imageshack.us/img523/3100/errorclickfordetailsls9.jpg[/img]
A theory is that I have RuneScape's cache in my computer, but I deleted it, (to the Recycle Bin) so I don't think that's the problem. I'm not IP Banned on RuneScape either, so don't say that.

item.title: 'Error: Click for details.' Problem
item.dc:creator: @Full_Metalst Full Metalst
item.description:
@Full_Metalst wrote:

That’s not the fucking problem lol. I’m making a new server on my gpa’s computer anyway, problem solved :D.

Read full topic
